flawed_nl_solution:
There were a total of 50 + 54 = <<50+54=104>>104 ice creams.
There were 50 x 3/5 = <<50*3/5=250/3>>250/3 chocolate-flavored ice creams sold.
There were 54 x 2/3 = <<54*2/3=36>>36 mango-flavored ice creams sold.
A total of 250/3 + 36 = <<250/3+36=358/3>>358/3 ice creams were sold.
So, 104 - 358/3 = <<104-358/3=-46/3>>-46/3 ice creams were not sold.
#### -46/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 250/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
